snippet: Results at the media company beat analysts’ estimates on both profit and revenue.
abstract: Gannett beats analysts' estimates as it benefits from strong television advertising; reports third-quarter profit of $133.1 million, or 56 cents a share, up 33 percent from $99.8 million, or 41 cents a share, in year-ago quarter; revenue rises 3.4 percent to $1.31 billion from $1.27 billion.
lead_paragraph: Results at the media company beat analysts’ estimates on both profit and revenue.

headline.main: Strong TV Advertising Bolsters Gannett’s Quarterly Results
headline.print_headline: Strong TV Advertising Bolsters Gannett’s Quarterly Results
